channel.title: DReejays podcast
channel.description:
Electro, Detroit Techno, Breakbeat, House, Disco... We play what we like, actually... subscribe for a fortnightly helping of it.
www.diningroomdjs.com
http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays
- - -
Merf solo mixes here: http://rationalise.podomatic.com - booty-tastic!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Get some moosic for your ears!

item.title: Merf vs Forward Thinking Tam - Fix Your Mixin'!
item.description: Peter Horrevorts - look up [Kanzleramt Germany] - - Gigi Galaxy - disco 2000 [Teknotika] Morgan Geist - waterwork [Fragmented] Stephen Brown - after life [Djax] Gigi Galaxy - phantom [Teknotika] - - Hermanos Iglesnos - BBSN [Fine Day] Jan Driver - rat alert [Music Man Belgium] - - Cubenx - repeat [Infinite] Chauffeur - last night I had too much to dream [not on label] Potential Difference - fuk dat [Sativae] - - L Vis 1990 - united groove [Mad Decent US] Little Nobody (feat Robo Brazileira) - robota (Ben Mill remix) [Hypnotic Room] Fake Blood - fix your accent [Cheap Thrills] - - Bigfoot Futures Ltd - omni mode megamix [Eukatech] Stephen Brown - [unknown] [Realtime] Floorplan - doin' my thing [Drama] - - Drums of Death - dodfucksupanescorttune [Civil Music] - - - -

item.title: Smack 4 presents: Forward-Thinking Tam
item.description: PLAYLIST Kiki - so easy to forget [BPitch Control Germany] Mochipet (feat Ellen Allien) - robot girl [Daly City US] Dada Life - this machine kills breakfasts [Alphabet City Germany] CLP - ready or not [Boysnoize Germany] Fake Blood - mars [Cheap Thrills] Inner City - big fun (SMD remix) [KMS US] Meat Katie - stop the revolution (Bassbin Twins remix) [Lot 49] Bingo Players - get up (Diplo remix) [Secure] Mochipet (feat The Hustle Heads) - get your whistle wet [Daly City] Diplo - blow your head [Mad Decent US] MSTRKRFT - vuvuvu [Dim Mak US] Fuck U Very Much - touch my hands [Fuck U Very Much] Alex Metric - shirley you cant be serious [Marine Parade] Lee Coombs - shiver (Plump DJs remix) [Finger Lickin'] Aquasky & Crash Berlin (feat Kool Keith) - moving the hype track (Nick Thayer mix) [Passenger] Justice - let there be light [Ed Banger] Chus & Ceballos vs Richie Santana - low frequencies (Superchumbo remix) [Stereo Productions Spain] DJ Misjah - dragonfly (Hertz remix) [ReRun] Deadmau5 - ghosts n stuff [Mau5trap] Surkin - next of kin [Institubes France] - - (Apologies for the sound quality/glitches on this one btw)

item.title: Merf presents: The NewWonkySpaceDiscoClub!
item.description: (Incidentally, we're going all local on your arses - you can hear us in my deeelightful hometown this Saturday: http://www.dreejays.com/funkyend1.htm ) PLAYLIST: Lindstrom and Solale - lets practice [Feedelity Norway] IO - Claire [Mo Wax Excursions] Nick Holder - america eats its young [NRK Sound Division] DJ Harry - aquarium man [Rong Music] Dub Pistols feat Terry Hall - rapture (Prins Thomas diskomiks) [] In Flagranti - teaching children how to swear [Codek Records Europe] Jungle Wonz - bird in a gilded cage (Danny Krivit Re-edit) [Skylax] Theo Parrish - falling up [Third Ear Recordings] Recloose - cardiology [Studio !K7] B12 - telefone 529 [Warp Records] F.U.S.E - uva [Plus 8 Records] Speedy J - r2d2 [Beam Me Up!] Lindstrom - there is a drink in my bedroom and i need a hot lady [Play Out!] War - galaxy (Plump DJs remix) [Finger Lickin' Records] Fern Kinney - groove me (Cosmo Vitelli edit) [] Flash & The Pan - hole in the middle (Cosmo Vitelli edit) [Ensign Records] That Thing - that thing (Cosmo Vitelli edit) [] - - - PS: Like the artwork? Here's more of it: http://www.bigaband.com

item.title: Oh Brother....
item.description: It's SMACK III tomorrow night - so here's another mix from Brother to get you warmed up. Go here for more details about set-times and location: http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays Illustration by www.rexbox.co.uk (who will be there with his pens at the ready and a beady eye on your body-parts tomorrow night) - - - Fuck Buttons – [] Chromeo – me and my man [V2 Records] Michael Jackson – Thriller [Epic] Peaches – downtown [XL Recordings] Justin Timberlake – sexy back (instrumental) [Jive] Nelly Furtardo - man eater (acapella) [Geffen] Digitalism – pogo [Kitsune] Poni Hoax - involutive star [Tigersushi] Calvin Harris – Acceptable in the 80’s [Eye Fly] Gorillaz- dare (Soulwax remix) [Virgin] LFO - freak [Warp Records] Justice – waters of nazareth [Vice Records] - - - ~Cheers! www.diningroomdjs.com

item.title: Merf vs Forward-Thinking Tam - Yeah!
item.description: Just over a week till you can catch us live at The Westbury in North London btw - go here for details: www.dreejays.com www.westburybar.com Playlist: Rex The Dog - sequencer [Kompakt Germany] Ed Chamberlain - dave [Base Logic] Kerri Chandler - the invaders (the panic) [Deeply Rooted House US] - - - KMS - til we meet again (carl craig remix) [KMS] Los Hermanos - quetzal [Los Hermanos] The Martian - stardancer [Red Planet] - - - Neztec and Vate - patria (Zimbardo remix) [Sango Music] Elite Force - you (Perc Dub) [Used & Abused] Minilogue - spam (Burt Banner love mix) [Frosty Music] - - - Black Devil Disco Club - the devil in us (dub) [Lo Recordings] Snoop Dogg - drop it like it's hot (unknown remix) [] Yelle - je veux te voir (Disco D remix) [Source Etc] - - - Paul Johnson - get get down [Fuel Records] Modeselektor - sucker pin [BPitch Control Germany] Meat Katie & D Ramirez - stop the revolution (Bassbins Twins rmx) [Lot 49] - - - Buckfunk 3000 - High Volume [Fuel Records UK] Starship 727 - Beam Boom Chuck [Pigna Records] Jedi Knights - dance of the naughty knights [Evolution] - - - Peabody & Sherman & Steve Fisk - wow! (P&S re-edit) [Super Bro] The Rare Lowry - JKD [] Baxendale - i built this city (Justus Köhncke mix) [Kompakt Pop] - - - Indeep - Last night a DJ saved my life (mirage remix) [Italians Do It Better Records] Edwin Birdsong - cola bottle bottle [Edwin Birdsong Music] War - galaxy (Plump DJs remix) [Finger Lickin' Records] - - - Mental Overdrive - original material [Full Pupp] Asobi Seksu - strawberries (CSS remix) [One Little Indian] The Knife - is it medicine [Brille Records] - - - www.diningroomdjs.com http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays - - - (Apologies for the occasional lapse in sound quality btw. It's almost like some idiot cranked the master volume on the mixer up far too high. It wasn't me. Honest..)

item.title: Brother Live at Smack!
item.description: So in the run up to Smack III next month, we're posting special guest DJ Brother's set from the last Smack, featuring tracks from: Christopher Just Money Mark Curtis Mayfield LFO Mr Oizo On the picture there is some RexArt - you can get yourself something similar, as well as hearing some fine tunage if you come down to The Westbury in London on Friday February 8th. See www.dreejays.com or www.westburybar.com -> 'what's on' for more details...
item.dc:creator: Forward-Thinking Tam
item.itunes:summary:
So in the run up to Smack III next month, we're posting special guest DJ Brother's set from the last Smack, featuring tracks from:
Christopher Just
Money Mark
Curtis Mayfield
LFO
Mr Oizo
On the picture there is some RexArt - you can get yourself something similar, as well as hearing some fine tunage if you come down to The Westbury in London on Friday February 8th.
See www.dreejays.com or www.westburybar.com -> 'what's on' for more details...

item.title: Forward-Thinking Tam's Friendly Trainwreck!
item.description: Mesh - i want to start [MESH records] S1ngularity - return of the savage bean [http://www.myspace.com/s1ngularity ] Si Begg - non stop cut paste [Noodles] Island 9 - bubble [Aprodisio Recordings] Model 500 - no ufos (D mix) [Metroplex US] GusGus - need in me [Pineapple] Ed Chamberlain - skyface [Digital Distortions] Orbital - you lot [Orbital Music] Dada Life - the great smorgasboard [Southern Fried] Dieter Schmidt - morse code from the cold war [Kitsune] Booka Shade - darko (Booka's Funk Da Funk mix) [Get Physical Music] Perc - ice cream for kenton (Perc's Final Insult mix) [Perc Trax] The Soft Pink Truth - make up [Soundslike] The Soft PinK Truth - real shocks [Soundslike] Modeselektor [feat Maximo Park] - (i can't sleep) without music [BPitch Control Germany] Dom Almond feat Vanessa - shake it (Zimbarbo & Zigmund Slezak remix) [Erase] DJ Homewrecker - glamour [AJ] The Sound Republic - fart mouth mikey [Guesthouse Music US] Etienne De Crecy - duke [XL] Fatboy Slim - love island [Skint] Blendbrank - space horse & force [Bugeyed US] Those Guys - i walk alone (Haji & Emanuel dub) [unknown label] Amon Tobin - verbal (acapella) Ninja Tune Rex The Dog - circulate [Kitsune] Cuizinier - l'encule le plus cool de la planete [Disque Primeur] - - - http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays
item.dc:creator: Forward-Thinking Tam
item.itunes:summary:
Mesh - i want to start [MESH records] S1ngularity - return of the savage bean [http://www.myspace.com/s1ngularity ] Si Begg - non stop cut paste [Noodles] Island 9 - bubble [Aprodisio Recordings] Model 500 - no ufos (D mix) [Metroplex US] GusGus - need in me [Pineapple] Ed Chamberlain - skyface [Digital Distortions] Orbital - you lot [Orbital Music] Dada Life - the great smorgasboard [Southern Fried] Dieter Schmidt - morse code from the cold war [Kitsune] Booka Shade - darko (Booka's Funk Da Funk mix) [Get Physical Music] Perc - ice cream for kenton (Perc's Final Insult mix) [Perc Trax] The Soft Pink Truth - make up [Soundslike] The Soft PinK Truth - real shocks [Soundslike] Modeselektor [feat Maximo Park] - (i can't sleep) without music [BPitch Control Germany] Dom Almond feat Vanessa - shake it (Zimbarbo & Zigmund Slezak remix) [Erase] DJ Homewrecker - glamour [AJ] The Sound Republic - fart mouth mikey [Guesthouse Music US] Etienne De Crecy - duke [XL] Fatboy Slim - love island [Skint] Blendbrank - space horse & force [Bugeyed US] Those Guys - i walk alone (Haji & Emanuel dub) [unknown label] Amon Tobin - verbal (acapella) Ninja Tune Rex The Dog - circulate [Kitsune] Cuizinier - l'encule le plus cool de la planete [Disque Primeur]

item.title: Forward-Thinking Tam's SlightlyFrenchFluff!
item.description: Oh, alright, its only 'slightly French' cos it's got Surkin in it. And Supermen Lovers... tres bien! (or something). - - - Fred Falke and Alex Braxe - intro [Vulture] DJ Fame - when i hear [Dubsided] Surkin - kiss & fly [Institubes France] Robbie WIlliams - never touch that switch (Dark Horse Dub) [Unknown Label] The Supermen Lovers - under pressure [Vendetta] Precision Cuts - takin' over [Streetwise] Prince Robotnik - 1999 Problems D'mour [unknown label] DJ Hell - let no man jack (Busy P Spotter mix) [Gigolo Germany] - - - http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays

item.title: Mr Small!
item.description: Bloody hell, is that the weekend gone already?! Ahhh well - here's a short-n-cheeky mix to perk your Monday up: - - - PLAYLIST Simian Mobile Disco - the count [Kitsune] Duce & Jeff FX - breakdown [Deeplay Soultec] Trick & Kubic - orbital dance machine (original mix) [Electrade France] Georgio Prezioso vs Libex - pongo (alternative mix) [Net's Work International] Para One - turtle trouble [Institubes France] - - - ~cheers!

item.title: Forward-Thinking Tam's Best Behaviour
item.description: Taking a breather from the usual electro/breakbeat onslaught this week... Here's something a bit less hectic than usual to kick back to after all that Smack Two palaver below.... (Umm.. nice, civilised glass of wine, anyone?) PLAYLIST: Mike Monday - what day is it? [Playtime] Speakerjunk - close your eyes [Dubsided] ETA - casual sub (45 Or 33? Radio Edit) [EastWest Records UK] Olivier Desmet - hot on your trail (Kinky Movement mix) [Amenti Music US] Mr Scruff - get a move on [Ninja Tune] Sueme - banana love [Neue Heimat Germany] Ricardo Rae - beeps, sweep & creeps [Guesthouse Music US] Crystal - i've been thinking (Lawnchair Generals mix) [Lawnchairs Generals Music US] Kinky Movement - atlantis [Replay] Kerri Chandler - moon bounce [Deeply Rooted House] Trackheadz - kompakt [Freerange] The Glimmers - track 2 (Kobe's in Columbia) [Diskimo] Corduroy - mini [Acid Jazz] - - - ~cheers! http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays

item.title: Merf vs Forward-Thinking Tam LIVE at Smack Two
item.description: Recorded live and random at The Good Ship, North London.... PLAYLIST: Adventure Kid - gentleman with beard playing squash [ www.adventurekid.se ] Bobmo - freak me [Institubes France] Modeselektor - silikon (Siriusmo_remix) [BPitch Control Germany] - - - Mike Dunn – Face the Nation [Clone Classics] Gosub - laugh track [Citinite] Adonis – no way back [Trax] - - - Speakerjunk - bounce [Dubsided] GusGus - david [Underwater Records] Delacy - hideaway [Belgium 541] - - - Kelley Polar – ashamed of myself [Environ] Recloose - get there tonight [Planet E] A Number of Names -Shari Vari (The Hacker + Vitalic remix) [Gigolo] - - - Digitalism - digitalism in cairo [Kitsune France] Les Rythmes Digitales -sometimes (feat Nik Kershaw) [Wall of Sound] Lee Coombs - shiver (Plump DJs mix) [Finger Lickin' Records] - - - Agent Foot & Deverb - together in the dark (Takeover Sound) Lenk - 444 [H Productions] Laid Back - white horse [Sire US] - - - Funkwerkstatt - standwaage [Superfancy] Imatran Voima - In Out (Jackal's Balrog Roller mix) [Monotone US] Shameboy - Splend It [Sputnik Belgium] - - - DJ Bone – platform 9 ¾ [Subject Detroit] Alexander Robotnik - problemes d'amour [Fuzz Dance] Frankie Knuckles /Jamie Principle - baby wants to ride [Trax] - - - Death to Sexy - 24 - 7 [Electrobug] Muse - supermassive blackhole (Bud & Stone remix) [unknown label] The Marlon Jacksons - steal your bike (Donald Glaude rmx) [Bugeyed US] - - - Maurice - this is acid (K&T mix) [Trax] Tyree Cooper – turn up the bass [dj international] Rhythim Is Rhythim - strings of life [transmat] ~Cheeeeeers! (and a big thanks to everyone who helped make it a grand night!) http://blog.myspace.com/dreejays

item.title: Merf presents "Happy Monsters"
item.description: An uplifting solo mix from Merf, to usher in the summer: . . . HAPPY MONSTERS: Los Hermanos - Birth of 3000 UR - Transition Mike Dunn - Dance You Mutha Fruit Loops - Message Is Love Funk D'Void - V-Ger Moodymann - Mahogany Brown Mood II Swing - Do It Your Way Ian Dury & The Blockheads - Reasons To Be Cheerful (Pt 3) Laid Back - White Horse Telex - Raised By Snakes (Joeseph Watt Remix) Kurtis Blow - The Breaks Fix - Flash Egyptian Lover - Egypt, Egypt Kraftwerk - Expo 2000 Kingpin Cartel - Moogie Nights Kelley Polar - Here In The Night Metro Area – Muira Kenny Dixon Jr - Untitled

item.title: Forward-Thinking Tam & the F**ked-Up Haircut - 03/04/07
item.description: PLAYLIST spoiler below, if you like that sort of thing... . . . . . . . Freak Power - turn on, tune in, cop out (Island Records) Precision Cuts - takin' over (streetwise) Drum Monkeys - batty batucuda (westway) The Beat Monkeys - Lord Of Eldorand (Brighton Breaks) Disco Duck- drop the bomb (Slut Trax) Chicken Lips - do it proper [Justin Robertson rmx] (Azuli) Surkin - ghetto obsession [2006 version] (Institubes France) Soulwax - NY lipps (PIAS) Abysm - future funk (Systematic Germany) Alan Braxe & Fred Falke - intro (Vulture France) ~cheers!
